column2: The Imperial Stain

The workers revolution succeeded in Russia, but there are still old imperialist and monarchist names in our cities and provinces, paying tribute to the oppressors of the proletariat. Let's erase this chapter and write a new one based on the heroes of the revolution.
The Communist Stain

The communists took the power by force and renamed our proud cities to their terrorist leaders names. It's time to go back to the old traditions and bury the names of the ones who brought our country to ruin.
The Imperial Stain in Ukraine

The workers revolution succeeded, but there are still old imperialist and monarchist names in our cities and provinces, paying tribute to the oppressors of the proletariat. Let's erase this chapter and write a new one based on the heroes of the revolution.
The Communist Stain in Ukraine

The communists took the power by force and renamed our proud cities to their terrorist leaders names. It's time to go back to the old traditions and bury the names of the ones who brought our country to ruin.
Renaming Saint Petersburg
The war with the Germans rage on and our government has a proposal to rename the city of Saint Petersburg to Petrograd, meaning "Peter's City", to remove the German words Sankt and Burg.
Names of Westpolen

In 1793, Prussia conquered the western part of poland in the 2nd Partition of Poland. For the next 13 years we tried to colonize the land, which failed because of napoleons victory 1806/7. After the congress of vienna we only got the western part of it back, but scince we defeated the russian bear, who took our rightful land back in the day, we can once again establish the german rule over western poland.
Names of Masowien

In 1795, Prussia conquered the eastern part of poland in the 3nd Partition of Poland. For the next 11 years we tried to colonize the land, which failed because of napoleons victory 1806/7. After the congress of vienna the zar got all of this land, but scince we defeated the russian bear, who took our rightful land back in the day, we can once again establish the german rule over eastern poland.
Names of Litauen

Scince the 14nd century there is a german minority in lithuania. They came mostly as traders of the Hanseatic League, but today they are just there as germans. Now where the russian empire is crumbling and we could take this land, we should rename it to show our pride for the 500 years of history of the Litauendeutsche.
Names of South Tyrol
The italian people in south tyrol were oppressed by the austrian tyrants for far too long. It is finally time to reclaim our rightful lands. Viva l'Italia!
Names of Istria

Names of South Tyrol
The italian stole our lands! But we defeated them and can finally reclaim our rightful lands. Gott ist mit uns!

The Enkaishu Region

The northern coast of the Asiatic continent, known to us by the name of Enkaishu, now is firmly in our hands. Nothing better to demonstrate that, and to encourage immigration, than renaming it to proper Japanese names.
